sentences.english: This will activate your parasympathetic nervous system which will calm you down and slow your heart rate.
sentences.chinese: 這樣能激活副交感神經，有助於安神和降低心率。

sentences.english: Longan tranquilizes the disturbed mind by nourishing the blood.
Objective To determine the content of geniposide in Jieyu Anshen capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定解鬱安神膠囊中梔子苷含量的方法。

sentences.english: Massage is also a good way to promote movement of the mind, soothe the nerves to brain.
sentences.chinese: 按摩也是促進大腦運動的好方法，能夠健腦安神。

sentences.english: Listening to music has a claming influence on her.
sentences.chinese: 聽音樂對她起一種定心安神的作用。

sentences.english: The key function is lowering liver and heart fire, calming the nerves.
People often say, day lily is "lotos" for it can "soothe the nerves."
sentences.chinese: 人們常說，黃花菜是“忘憂草”，能安神解鬱。

sentences.english: Up to raise the effectiveness of blood and soothe the nerves , the.
sentences.chinese: 製成乾果食用，對人體有補心脾，養血安神的功效。

sentences.english: The tranquilizing and allaying excitement methods had an advantage than common acupuncture group on treating hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神針刺法治療偏頭痛遠期療效優於普通針刺組。

sentences.english: Professor Zhang's empirical prescription "Anshen Decoction"is introduced, and one representative case is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹其經驗方安神湯，並舉一則典型病例以說明。

sentences.english: Longan nourishes the heart and calms the mind.
Calm and soothe the nerves , eliminating anxiety, to calm down emotions, people carefully calm.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神，消除焦慮，平復情緒，使人心地平和。

sentences.english: The present invention has the effects of nourishing liver and kidney, tranquilizing and inducing resuscitation.
sentences.chinese: 具有滋補肝腎，安神通竅的功效。

sentences.english: Calm and soothe the nerves, eliminating anxiety, people carefully calm, calm down emotions.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神，消除焦慮，使人心地平和，平復情緒。

sentences.english: Objective To study sedative hypnotic action of Anshen capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究安神膠囊的鎮靜催眠作用。

sentences.english: It buys you time and calms your nerves. Pause, smile and count to three before saying anything.
sentences.chinese: 這可以爲你贏得時間，讓你能鎮定安神。
